body: LHOR, I can't get to the bottom of it right now but, using the "Label Zone Surfaces" component, it looks like the problem is related to this "Core_Piano" surface that you have jutting out into the middle of one of your zones: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Wui*gYiAaOpTJSuTvWZTtYWr0jsdnhxUoMPyzAhHVfjU9x6NuUVNKsv*2gSEVMB8hi5K-b3xXPRNjIdqUbNB9V4pMjQ-eDGo/CorePiano.JPG) Try removing it and see if that fixes the problem. -Chris
